document.full_text: an austrian town revoked the honorary citizenship of adolf hitler tuesday in an effort to sever any links with the nazi dictator's legacy ahead of a 900-year civic anniversary and following a media uproar.
document.title: austrian town revokes hitler's honorary title
lines_and_colors: an austrian town revoked the honorary citizenship of adolf hitler tuesday in an effort to sever any links with the nazi dictator's legacy ahead of a 900-year civic anniversary and following a media uproar.
